message: Let's make a deal Bob.  I get $60, you get $40. It's a good deal for you to take now before inflation eats away at your share!
Alice, my turn.  I'm feeling generous, so I'll offer you $45.  Take it now, it's only going to get worse for both of us if we wait!
Bob, it's getting late in the game.  I'll take $55 and you get $45.  This is your last chance to get a decent share!
